Charismatic and flamboyant, this band had a hat full of hits in the early 80s. Super smooth ballots like 'in the heat of the night' and the amazing 'body talk', dance floor club classics such as 'flash back, 'music and lights' and the brilliant 'just an illusion'.

There are other quite catchy album tracks here as well. All in all, even now, this is pretty good stuff.
